thread.title: 'The Lego Batman Movie' Gets Publicity From 'Gotham Cribs' episode | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: 'The Lego Batman Movie' Gets Publicity From 'Gotham Cribs' episode | The Daily Dot

author: Josh Katzowitz
title: 'The Lego Batman Movie' Gets Publicity From 'Gotham Cribs' episode | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Warner Bros. Pictures/YouTube BTW 
For nearly a year, we’ve seen trailers for the Lego Batman Movie , and the countdown until Friday’s release date has slowly reached a pinnacle of excitement. 
To cool you off for a few more days, though, Warner Bros. has released an episode of Gotham Cribs , in which Batman himself gives a “sick tour” of Wayne Manor, “the most tasteful and insanely extravagant in all of Gotham City.” 
Make sure to watch as Batman and ... ahem ... his roommate Bruce “B Money” Wayne show off everything they’ve got.
